      • createSandbox

        public JCSandboxType createSandbox(String name,
                                   ClassLoader sandbox_host_classloader,
                                   JCClassLoaderPolicyType sandbox_host_class_policy,
                                   JCClassNameResolverType in_class_resolver,
                                   JCClassLoaderPolicyType sandbox_class_policy,
                                   Permissions in_p)
                            throws JCSandboxException
        Description copied from interface: JCSandboxesType
        Create a new sandbox.
        Specified by:
        createSandbox in interface JCSandboxesType
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the sandbox (must be valid, see @link JCSandboxNames).
        sandbox_host_classloader - The class loader used to load classes on the host (outside of the sandbox)
        sandbox_host_class_policy - The policy that controls access to classes outside of the sandbox
        in_class_resolver - The class name resolver
        sandbox_class_policy - The policy that controls which classes will be loaded using the sandbox class loader
        in_p - The permissions assigned to the sandbox
        Returns:
        A new sandbox
        Throws:
        JCSandboxDuplicateException - If the sandbox already exists
        JCSandboxException - On other sandbox errors
